'''Shizuru''' {{Lang|ja=思鶴|ja_rm=<!-- perhaps "Umitsuru" considering the name of the historical Okinawan poet -->|ja_lit=Thought-Crane}} is an [[NPC]] in [[Inazuma]]. She can first be found at the [[Sangonomiya Shrine]] at [[Watatsumi Island]].

Interacting with her will initiate the [[Clean House]] World Quest.

===Appearance===
Shizuru wears the standard shrine maiden uniform consisting of a white ''kosode'' and blue ''hakama'', white socks, and ''okobo'' sandals with blue straps. Her outfit contains deep blue accents.

==Trivia==
*Her name may be a reference to {{Lang|Yoshiya Umitsuru|ja=よしや思鶴}} (17th or 18th century), also known as {{w|Yoshiya Chiru|Yoshiya Chiruu}}, a poet in the {{w|Ryukyu Kingdom}}. She is renowned for the {{w|Ryūka|Ryuuka}}-style poetry.
